name: com.lt2333.simplicitytools

releases.description:
- [新增] 旧版快速设置行列自定义
- [修复] MIUI22.3.14之后解除截屏裁切限制失效

---

- [New] Old Quick Settings rows and columns custom
- [Bug fix] After the MIUI22.3.14 version, Remove screenshot crop restriction failure
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 旧版快速设置行列自定义
  • [修复] MIUI22.3.14之后解除截屏裁切限制失效
  • [New] Old Quick Settings rows and columns custom
  • [Bug fix] After the MIUI22.3.14 version, Remove screenshot crop restriction failure

releases.description:
- [新增] 第三方锁屏主题双击息屏
- [新增] 状态栏双击息屏
---
- [New] Third-party lock screen theme double-tap to sleep
- [New] double-tap Status bar to sleep
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 第三方锁屏主题双击息屏
  • [新增] 状态栏双击息屏
  • [New] Third-party lock screen theme double-tap to sleep
  • [New] double-tap Status bar to sleep

releases.description:
- [新增] 双击桌面锁屏功能
- [修复] 其他页无重启菜单

---

- [New] Double-tap home to sleep
- [Fix] No restart menu on other pages
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 双击桌面锁屏功能
  • [修复] 其他页无重启菜单
  • [New] Double-tap home to sleep
  • [Fix] No restart menu on other pages

releases.description:
- [新增] 隐藏状态栏图标独立页
- [新增] 子页面重启菜单
- [修复] MIUI22.3.12版本后下拉天气显示异常
- [修复] 隐藏无SIM卡图标开关丢失

---

- [New] Hide status bar icon separate page
- [New] Sub-page restart menu
- [Bug fix] MIUI22.3.12 rear panel weather display exception
- [Bug fix] Hide no SIM card icon switch lost
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 隐藏状态栏图标独立页
  • [新增] 子页面重启菜单
  • [修复] MIUI22.3.12版本后下拉天气显示异常
  • [修复] 隐藏无SIM卡图标开关丢失
  • [New] Hide status bar icon separate page
  • [New] Sub-page restart menu
  • [Bug fix] MIUI22.3.12 rear panel weather display exception
  • [Bug fix] Hide no SIM card icon switch lost

releases.description:
- [新增] 移除打开应用弹窗
- [修复] 蓝牙断开后任然显示电量
- [优化] 可单独隐藏音量、勿扰图标
- [优化] 完全重构隐藏状态栏图标功能

由于MIUI22.3.12更新了系统界面相关代码，导致无法正常显示通知面板和控制中心的天气，等待修复中。

---

- [New] Remove open application pop-up window
- [Bug fix] Show battery level even after Bluetooth disconnection
- [Optimize] Hide volume and do not disturb icons separately
- [Optimize] Completely refactor the function of hiding status bar icons

Due to MIUI22.3.12 updated system interface related code, the weather of notification panel and control center cannot be displayed normally, waiting for fix
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 移除打开应用弹窗
  • [修复] 蓝牙断开后任然显示电量
  • [优化] 可单独隐藏音量、勿扰图标
  • [优化] 完全重构隐藏状态栏图标功能

由于MIUI22.3.12更新了系统界面相关代码，导致无法正常显示通知面板和控制中心的天气，等待修复中。

  • [New] Remove open application pop-up window
  • [Bug fix] Show battery level even after Bluetooth disconnection
  • [Optimize] Hide volume and do not disturb icons separately
  • [Optimize] Completely refactor the function of hiding status bar icons

Due to MIUI22.3.12 updated system interface related code, the weather of notification panel and control center cannot be displayed normally, waiting for fix

releases.description:
- [新增] 锁屏充电时显示电流 (@YuKongA)
- [更新] 多国语言翻译

---

- [New] Show current when charging on lock screen (@YuKongA)
- [Update] Multi-language translation
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 锁屏充电时显示电流 (@YuKongA)
  • [更新] 多国语言翻译
  • [New] Show current when charging on lock screen (@YuKongA)
  • [Update] Multi-language translation

releases.description:
- [修复] 旧版通知面板天气不显示
- [新增] 印度尼西亚语翻译 100%
- [新增] 土耳其语翻译 100%
- [新增] [翻译] 法语48% 、日语23%、罗马尼亚语3%、西班牙语22%、越南语15% 翻译

---

- [Bug fix] Weather not shown in old notification panel
- [New] Indonesian translation 100%
- [New] Turkish translation 100%
- [New] [Translation] French 48%, Japanese 23%, Romanian 3%, Spanish 22%, Vietnamese 15%
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [修复] 旧版通知面板天气不显示
  • [新增] 印度尼西亚语翻译 100%
  • [新增] 土耳其语翻译 100%
  • [新增] [翻译] 法语48% 、日语23%、罗马尼亚语3%、西班牙语22%、越南语15% 翻译
  • [Bug fix] Weather not shown in old notification panel
  • [New] Indonesian translation 100%
  • [New] Turkish translation 100%
  • [New] [Translation] French 48%, Japanese 23%, Romanian 3%, Spanish 22%, Vietnamese 15%

releases.description:
- [新增] 调整启动器壁纸缩放比例 (@YuKongA)
- [新增] 俄语翻译
- [新增] 参与翻译入口（帮助我们将APP翻译成您的语言）
- [优化] 提升项目稳定性，优化项目流畅度

---

- [New] Adjust launcher wallpaper scaling (@YuKongA)
- [New] Russian translation
- [New] Participate in translation portal (help us translate the app into your language)
- [Optimize] Improve project stability and optimize project fluency
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 调整启动器壁纸缩放比例 (@YuKongA)
  • [新增] 俄语翻译
  • [新增] 参与翻译入口（帮助我们将APP翻译成您的语言）
  • [优化] 提升项目稳定性，优化项目流畅度
  • [New] Adjust launcher wallpaper scaling (@YuKongA)
  • [New] Russian translation
  • [New] Participate in translation portal (help us translate the app into your language)
  • [Optimize] Improve project stability and optimize project fluency

releases.description:
- [优化] 项目结构，提升稳定性 (@qqlittleice233)
- [新增] Alpha充电动画 (@YifePlayte)
- [新增] 手机管家电池温度显示 (@YuKongA)
- [优化] 显示通知重要程度 (@ztc1997)

EN:
- [Optimize] Project structure, improve stability (@qqlittleice233)
- [New] Alpha charging animation (@YifePlayte)
- [New] Phone Manager battery temperature display (@YuKongA)
- [Optimized] Show notification importance (@ztc1997)
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [优化] 项目结构，提升稳定性 (@qqlittleice233)
  • [新增] Alpha充电动画 (@YifePlayte)
  • [新增] 手机管家电池温度显示 (@YuKongA)
  • [优化] 显示通知重要程度 (@ztc1997)

EN:

  • [Optimize] Project structure, improve stability (@qqlittleice233)
  • [New] Alpha charging animation (@YifePlayte)
  • [New] Phone Manager battery temperature display (@YuKongA)
  • [Optimized] Show notification importance (@ztc1997)

releases.description:
- [新增] 支持点击下拉天气启动APP
- [新增] 旧版通知面板天气
- [新增] 显示通知重要程度，可隐藏常驻通知图标 (@ztc1997)
- [新增] 移除主题壁纸的广告 (@Houvven)
- [修复] 挖孔屏居中,向顺时针旋转90°,横屏显示溢出的问题
- [修复] 隐藏WIFI标准后偶现的问题

EN:
- [New] Support to launch APP by clicking the drop-down weather
- [New] Older version of notification panel weather
- [New] Show notification importance, can hide resident notification icon (@ztc1997)
- [New] Remove ads from theme manager (@Houvven)
- [Bug fix] Centering the hole in the screen, rotate 90° clockwise, the horizontal display overflow problem
- [Bug fix] Occasional problem after hiding WIFI standard
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 支持点击下拉天气启动APP
  • [新增] 旧版通知面板天气
  • [新增] 显示通知重要程度，可隐藏常驻通知图标 (@ztc1997)
  • [新增] 移除主题壁纸的广告 (@Houvven)
  • [修复] 挖孔屏居中,向顺时针旋转90°,横屏显示溢出的问题
  • [修复] 隐藏WIFI标准后偶现的问题

EN:

  • [New] Support to launch APP by clicking the drop-down weather
  • [New] Older version of notification panel weather
  • [New] Show notification importance, can hide resident notification icon (@ztc1997)
  • [New] Remove ads from theme manager (@Houvven)
  • [Bug fix] Centering the hole in the screen, rotate 90° clockwise, the horizontal display overflow problem
  • [Bug fix] Occasional problem after hiding WIFI standard

releases.description:
- [新增] 隐藏网速分隔符 (粗粮作者@Houvven)
- [新增] 去除系统更新OTA校验 (粗粮作者@Houvven)
- [新增] 解除自动连招黑名单 (粗粮作者@Houvven)

EN：
- [New] Hide network speed separator(@Houvven)
- [New] Remove system update OTA check (@Houvven)
- [New] Remove game blacklist (@Houvven)
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 隐藏网速分隔符 (粗粮作者@Houvven)
  • [新增] 去除系统更新OTA校验 (粗粮作者@Houvven)
  • [新增] 解除自动连招黑名单 (粗粮作者@Houvven)

EN：

  • [New] Hide network speed separator(@Houvven)
  • [New] Remove system update OTA check (@Houvven)
  • [New] Remove game blacklist (@Houvven)

releases.description:
- [修复] 状态栏星期与小时之间无空格的问题
- [修复] 下拉天气不会更新的问题
- [优化] 天气组件相关代码

EN:
- [Bug fix] No space between week and hour in status bar
- [Bug fix] Drop-down weather won't update
- [Optimize] Code related to weather component
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [修复] 状态栏星期与小时之间无空格的问题
  • [修复] 下拉天气不会更新的问题
  • [优化] 天气组件相关代码

EN:

  • [Bug fix] No space between week and hour in status bar
  • [Bug fix] Drop-down weather won't update
  • [Optimize] Code related to weather component

releases.description:
- [新增] 支持国际用户自定义时钟
- [优化] 自定义状态栏时间功能，提升运行效率，减少功耗
- [优化] 设置界面优化

EN:
- [New] Support international user-defined clock
- [Optimize] Customize the status bar time function to improve operation efficiency and reduce power consumption
- [Optimize] Settings interface optimization
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 支持国际用户自定义时钟
  • [优化] 自定义状态栏时间功能，提升运行效率，减少功耗
  • [优化] 设置界面优化

EN:

  • [New] Support international user-defined clock
  • [Optimize] Customize the status bar time function to improve operation efficiency and reduce power consumption
  • [Optimize] Settings interface optimization

releases.description:
- [新增] 时间居中布局兼容模式
- [新增] 手动调整状态栏布局左右边距
- [优化] 时钟自定义总开关未开启时，隐藏子开关

EN:
- [New] Time centered layout compatibility mode
- [New] Manually adjust the left and right margins of the status bar layout
- [Optimize] Hide sub-switch when clock customization master switch is not on
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 时间居中布局兼容模式
  • [新增] 手动调整状态栏布局左右边距
  • [优化] 时钟自定义总开关未开启时，隐藏子开关

EN:

  • [New] Time centered layout compatibility mode
  • [New] Manually adjust the left and right margins of the status bar layout
  • [Optimize] Hide sub-switch when clock customization master switch is not on

releases.description:
- 新增 状态栏时间居中布局

EN:
- Add Status bar time center
releases.descriptionHTML:
• 新增 状态栏时间居中布局

EN:

  • Add Status bar time center

releases.description:
- 新增 隐藏/显示充电图标
- 新增 隐藏WIFI标准图标

EN：
- Add hide / display charging icon
- Add hide WiFi standard icon
releases.descriptionHTML:
• 新增 隐藏/显示充电图标
  • 新增 隐藏WIFI标准图标

EN：

  • Add hide / display charging icon
  • Add hide WiFi standard icon

readme:
Simplicity Tools

English 丨 简体中文

一个基于 MIUI13（Android12）适配的系统拓展Xposed模块

--- ### 模块说明 仅支持MIUI13（Android12）。其余版本可能无效，请不要安装使用。 目前处于开发初期阶段，功能较少，后续将逐步完善。 开发者：[酷安@乌堆小透明](http://www.coolapk.com/u/883441) --- ### 模块截图 ![截图](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LittleTurtle2333/SimplicityTools/main/doc/cn.jpg) --- ### 下载地址 Xposed仓库下载：[点击此处下载最新发行版](https://github.com/Xposed-Modules-Repo/com.lt2333.simplicitytools/releases) 酷安下载：[点击此处下载最新发行版](https://www.coolapk.com/apk/com.lt2333.simplicitytools) --- ### 改进翻译 [![Crowdin](https://badges.crowdin.net/simplicitytools/localized.svg)](https://crowdin.com/project/simplicitytools)[点击此处进入Crowdin](https://crowdin.com/project/simplicitytools) --- ### 第三方开源引用 ##### GNU General Public License v3.0 [qqlittleice/MiuiHome](https://github.com/qqlittleice/MiuiHome) [yujincheng08/BiliRoaming](https://github.com/yujincheng08/BiliRoaming) ##### GNU General Public License v2.0 [LSPosed/CorePatch](https://github.com/LSPosed/CorePatch) ##### GNU Lesser General Public License v2.1 [577fkj/blockmiui](https://github.com/577fkj/blockmiui) --- ### License [GNU General Public License v3.0](https://github.com/LittleTurtle2333/SimplicityTools/blob/main/LICENSE)
readmeHTML:
Simplicity Tools

English 丨 简体中文

一个基于 MIUI13（Android12）适配的系统拓展Xposed模块

模块说明

仅支持MIUI13（Android12）。其余版本可能无效，请不要安装使用。
目前处于开发初期阶段，功能较少，后续将逐步完善。

开发者：酷安@乌堆小透明

模块截图

下载地址

summary:
一个基于 MIUI13（Android12）适配的系统拓展Xposed模块  
A system extension Xposed module based on MIUI13 (Android12)  
开发者：@乌堆小透明
